sourcesContent:
import React, { memo } from 'react';
import { useForm } from "react-hook-form";
import { Popup } from '../';
import styles from './ProductСreate.module.css';
import cn from 'classnames';
import { Button } from '../../elements';
import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form';
import Select from 'react-select'
export const ProductСreate = memo(({ className, opened }) => {
    const { register, handleSubmit, watch, formState: { errors } } = useForm();
    const onSubmit = data => console.log(data);

    console.log(watch("example")); // watch input value by passing the name of it
    const options = [
        { value: 'chocolate', label: 'Chocolate' },
        { value: 'strawberry', label: 'Strawberry' },
        { value: 'vanilla', label: 'Vanilla' }
    ];
    return (
        <Popup opened={opened} title="Добавить продукт">
            <Form>
                <Form.Group controlId="exampleForm.ControlInput1">
                    <Form.Label>Имя</Form.Label>
                    <Form.Control type="text" placeholder="Введите название" />
                </Form.Group>
                <Form.Group controlId="exampleForm.ControlInput1">
                    <Form.Check 
                        type="checkbox"
                        label="Активный"
                    />
                </Form.Group>
                <Form.Group controlId="exampleForm.ControlInput1">
                    <Form.Check 
                        type="checkbox"
                        label="Избранное"
                    />
                </Form.Group>
               
                <Form.Group controlId="exampleForm.ControlSelect3">
                    <Form.Label>Категория</Form.Label>
                    <Select options={options} />
                </Form.Group>
                <Form.Group controlId="exampleForm.ControlSelect2">
                    <Form.Label>Кухня</Form.Label>
                    <Form.Control as="select" multiple>
                        <option>Русская кухня</option>
                        <option>Итальянская кухня</option>
                        <option>Японская кухня</option>
                        <option>Паназиатская кухня</option>
                        <option>Авторская кухня</option>
                    </Form.Control>
                </Form.Group>
                <Form.Group controlId="exampleForm.ControlSelect2">
                    <Form.Label>Кухня</Form.Label>
                    <Form.Control as="select" multiple>
                        <option>Русская кухня</option>
                        <option>Итальянская кухня</option>
                        <option>Японская кухня</option>
                        <option>Паназиатская кухня</option>
                        <option>Авторская кухня</option>
                    </Form.Control>
                </Form.Group>
                <Form.Group controlId="exampleForm.ControlTextarea1">
                    <Form.Label>Example textarea</Form.Label>
                    <Form.Control as="textarea" rows={3} />
                </Form.Group>
            </Form>
        </Popup>
    );
});
